item.description:
Zele Avradopoulos, noted Professional Organizer (featured in the Boston Globe, among other places) is going to help us get organized!

Come learn her wonderful tips and suggestions. Besides, Zele's such a fun person that I GUARANTEE you'll have a good time!

The fee is $5.00. Please pay ahead (on the web site). If you cannot do this, let me know. I'm OK with accepting money at the meeting, but I hate to spend precious meeting time hitting people up for their $5.00! Thanks....

There will definitely be a raffle, and anyway...this is a NETWORKING meeting, ladies! Please bring business cards!!



Cheers, Karen
617-650-8716
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.name: Want to be more organized? (and who DOESN'T?)
